title: Meet The Planetary Academy
summary: Our lifetime love of space exploration can start when we are very young. And so, we have developed the Planetary Academy, a 100% space-related membership created for kids 10 years old and younger.

title: NASA’s Artemis I mission has successfully launched
summary: Despite several setbacks and delays, NASA's Artemis I mission successfully launched from Kennedy Space Center on November 16, 2022.

title: LightSail 2 is about to burn up
summary: After 3.5 years, 18,000 orbits of the Earth, and 8 million kilometers (5 million miles) traveled, The Planetary Society’s successful LightSail 2 solar sail spacecraft will burn up as it reenters the Earth’s atmosphere in the next few days.
